info.title: Sleep Sensor

sensor.sleep.name: sensor.sleep
sensor.sleep.description: This Resource describes whether human sleep has been sensed or not. The Property "value" is a boolean. A value of 'true' means that sleep has been sensed. A value of 'false' means that sleep not been sensed.

value.name: value
value.description: The sleep sensor, true = sleep sensed, false = sleep not sensed.
